effect.create_shimmer.shimmer.descriptio: Enhances combat abilities but distorts vision and causes occasional extra damage
item.create_shimmer.charm_of_shimmer_1.t: When in the inventory, prevents one death; grants the Shimmer effect upon triggering.
item.create_shimmer.charm_of_shimmer_2.t: When in the inventory, prevents one death; grants the Shimmer effect upon triggering.
item.create_shimmer.shimmer_reagent.tool: Grants the Shimmer effect. Your vision will be filled with purple mist, attack speed, mining speed and movement speed will be increased, but you may take additional magic damage when attacked.
item.create_shimmer.shimmer_bucket.toolt: Grants the Shimmer effect. Your vision will be filled with purple mist, attack speed, mining speed and movement speed will be increased, but you may take additional magic damage when attacked.
item.create_shimmer.shimmer_sword.toolti: Grants the target 7 seconds of Shimmer effect, and may also grant the effect to yourself when used. Attack damage increases while under Shimmer effect
Grants the target 7 seconds of Shimmer effect, and may also grant the effect to yourself when used. Attack damage and mining speed increase while under Shimmer effect
item.create_shimmer.shimmer_pickaxe.tool: Grants the target 7 seconds of Shimmer effect, and may also grant the effect to yourself when used. Attack damage and mining speed increase while under Shimmer effect
item.create_shimmer.shimmer_shovel.toolt: Grants the target 7 seconds of Shimmer effect, and may also grant the effect to yourself when used. Attack damage and mining speed increase while under Shimmer effect
Soil infused with magical energy, capable of granting special properties to certain plants.
When Glow Berries or Torchflower Seeds are planted below:
The plants gain a restorative ability, allowing them to regrow after being harvested.
The soil emits a faint light and significantly accelerates the growth of any crop planted on it.
tooltip.create_shimmer.shimmer_effect: Grants increased attack speed, movement speed, and damage
tooltip.create_shimmer.shimmer_warning: Caution: May cause vision impairment and vulnerability
